attributes.action: Arrest Anjem Choudary - Suspicion of Inciting Terrorism
attributes.additional_details:
Anjem Choudary refused to condem the Woolwich attack on BBC One, and did not deny whether he had a role to play in radicalising the attacker(s).

The Woolwich attack involved an innocent man whom was beheaded and butchered like meat in the streets of London in front of a school and the public.

We the undersigned ask the UK Government for his arrest and a subsequent investigation under the Terrorism Act 2006 and other legislation for suspicion of inciting terrorism / terrorist activities.
